import Experience from "./CV Components/Experience"; import CVHeader from "./CV Components/CVHeader" import EduInfo from "./CV Components/EduInfo" import CVFooter from "./CV Components/CVFooter" const PersonalCV = ({ infos, exps, onDelete, edus }) => { return (

Experience

{exps.map((exp) => ( ))}

Personal Brief

{infos.description}

Education

{edus.map((edu) => ( ))}
) } export default PersonalCV
